Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1980...
Had first career hit on 5/19/1983, off Rick Wise (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/22/1983, off Bill Dillman (CAL)...
Injured on 6/12/1983 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/13/1984 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/27/1984 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1987, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 5/10/1988...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/9/1989 with a Broken Ankle, out for full season...
Injured on 4/19/1991 with a Concussion, out for one week...
